title: Collect posts from Twitter and send to Airtable
author: OsherD
workflow_json: {"id":1003,"name":"New tweets","nodes":[{"name":"On clicking 'execute'","type":"n8n-nodes-base.manualTrigger","position":[240,260],"parameters":{},"typeVersion":1},{"name":"Twitter","type":"n8n-nodes-base.twitter","position":[520,160],"parameters":{"limit":100,"operation":"search","searchText":"verstappen","additionalFields":{"resultType":"mixed"}},"typeVersion":1},{"name":"Set_AT_list","type":"n8n-nodes-base.set","position":[780,360],"parameters":{"values":{"number":[{"name":"Likes","value":"={{$node[\"Twitter\"].json[\"favorite_count\"] readme: This workflow collects tweets (100 but adjustable) and add them to AirTable. Starting the 2nd execution, the workflow will add only the new tweets (based on Tweet ID), so there won't be any tweet duplications
readme_zh: 该工作流程会收集推文（默认100条，数量可调）并将其添加至AirTable。从第二次执行开始，工作流程将仅新增未收录的推文（依据推文ID判断），从而避免任何推文重复添加的情况。
